all_response:
Jax: You need to construct power transmission infrastructure from the wind power station to Star City. This includes building a transmission line from the wind power station to Star City, installing transformers at the Star City substation, and constructing transmission lines between different areas within Star City.
Jax: The wind power station to Star City should use ultra-high voltage transmission lines to cover the large distances efficiently.
Jax: Transmission lines between different areas within Star City should use ordinary high voltage transmission lines which reach each residential area and connect directly to existing transformers to convert to civil low voltage. Civilian low-voltage transmission lines are readily available, we do not need to care about
Jax: You need to install red star transformers at the Star City substation, for converting ultra-high voltage to high voltage.

all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not specify which type of transmission line to use for the long-distance connection between the wind power station and Star City. This response addresses the question of which transmission line to use for this specific segment, specifying that ultra-high voltage transmission lines should be used to efficiently cover the large distances. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the need to choose between different types of transmission lines for long-distance connections.

Jax previously mentioned the need to construct transmission lines within Star City but did not clarify which type of transmission line to use for these shorter, intra-city connections. This response addresses the question of which transmission line to use within Star City, specifying that ordinary high voltage transmission lines should be used to connect residential areas and existing transformers. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the need to choose between different types of transmission lines for intra-city connections.

There are two types of transformers in the game scenario, and the previous response did not specify which transformer to install at the Star City substation. This response addresses the question of which transformer to use, specifying that the red star transformer should be installed at the Star City substation to convert ultra-high voltage to high voltage. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple transformers and is unsure which one to use for the substation.

all_response:
Jax: You need to set up a smart grid for a modern community. The grid in this neighborhood is already established, but you will need to install a control system and link electrical units within the community together via a network. The electrical units consist of residential houses and electric vehicle charging points in the community parking lot. Once these units are all connected, we hope the control system can balance grid load by diverting power from connected electric vehicle batteries to residential use during the evening peak of electricity usage, and then later recharging the vehicles at night during low usage hours. In addition, you need to install some small-scale power generators into the smart grid to generate green energy.
Jax: You should install a solar system intelligent network control system for the community, as other control systems are for use with smart high-voltage grids. The solar system smart network control system will automatically handle the scheduling of electric vehicle energy.
Jax: You should set up a power line carrier communication network for the community grid. Because this is the lowest cost and only compatible solar system intelligent network control system. It communicates directly using the off-the-shelf power grid.
Jax: Small-scale solar power generators are most suitable for this community as the area is sunny and has relatively little wind due to its location.

all_response_exaplain: There are multiple intelligent network control systems available in the backpack (Solar System intelligent network control systems, Galactic intelligent network control systems, Leo intelligent network control systems). The previous responses did not specify which control system to use for the community grid. This response addresses the question of which control system to install, specifying that the Solar System intelligent network control system should be used because it is designed for smart low-voltage grids, unlike the other systems which are for high-voltage grids.

There are multiple communication network setup skills available (Set up power line carrier communication network, Set up wireless communication network, Set up wired communication network). The previous responses did not specify which communication network to set up for the community grid. This response addresses the question of which communication network to set up, specifying that the power line carrier communication network should be used because it is the lowest cost and is compatible with the Solar System intelligent network control system, communicating directly using the existing power grid.

There are multiple small-scale power generators available in the backpack (Small-scale wind power generator, Small-scale solar power generator). The previous responses did not specify which power generator to install for the community grid. This response addresses the question of which power generator to install, specifying that the small-scale solar power generator is most suitable due to the sunny conditions and relatively little wind in the area.

all_response:
Jax: You need to build transmission lines that reach different city substations from a wind farm. You first need to build the transmission lines from the wind power station to the Star City substation, then build the transmission lines from the Star City substation to each of the two forest substations. Finally, you will build the lines between the forest substations and the Ocean City substation.
Jax: An ultra-high voltage transmission line should be used from the Star City substation to the Mysterious Forest substation because of the distances involved.
Jax: You should use high voltage transmission lines from Star City Substation to the Fantasy Forest Substation as the distance is only moderate, and ultra-high voltage cables have a high cost.
Jax: You should build a line from the Fantasy Forest Substation to the Ocean City Substation. The Fantasy Forest Substation is closer to the Ocean City Substation and the Mysterious Forest Substation is too far from Ocean City and does not need to be directly connected.
Jax: You should use high voltage transmission lines to the Ocean City Substation as the distance is only moderate, and ultra-high voltage cables would be too costly.
Jax: You should use ultra-high voltage transmission lines between the Wind Power Station and the Star City Substation to cover the large distances efficiently.
